lyrics:
53 contributorssoma lyricsverse 1
soma is what they would take when

saw pain in a new way
high stakes for a few names
racin against sunbeams

in your eyes

chorus
and i am
stop
and go

stop
and go

interlude

verse 2
when i saw her for the first time
lips moved as her eyes closed
heard something in his voice
and ill be there
he says then he walks out
somehow he was tryin
too hard to be like them
see the strokes liveget tickets as low as 122you might also likechorus
and i am
stop
and go
in your eyes
and i am
stop
oh darling let me go

outro
tried it once and they liked it
and tried to hide it
says ive been doin this twentyfive years
well im not listenin no more
and these friends they keep askin for more
oh yeah oh but thats it14embed
